channel.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
channel.description:
I'm sure everybody has scammed at one point, but I just had the opportunity to scam 20m and I felt like shit, so I gave him back his $.
So, if you scammed a guy (friend or not) for 10m-20000b would you feel bad?

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @Speljohan Speljohan
item.description:
@Speljohan wrote:

This is from a private server, pretty recent.

UO Second Age

UO Second Age: cA Adventures: Home Security Notice

cA Adventures: Home Security Notice

As you can see, being a douchy thief can be funny too!

Read full topic
item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Speljohan, post:148, topic:448065”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=550959.msg4045713#msg4045713 date=1342090624]

[quote author=Speljohan link=topic=550959.msg4045662#msg4045662 date=1342087283]

You can’t buy or sell time

This quote is getting too long, I don’t think that we can ever come ot a close agreement so lets jsut agree ot disagree

No, but you can buy/sell the result of the time.

I bet a lot of people out there are possibly making a living selling GP and gaining it back on rs or even scamming the GP. The truth is that it does have irl values and to some it’s more than just a “game” but a job.
[/quote]I shouldn’t have to take that into consideration in the first place, because they are evidently breaking the rules.

Sidenote: I don’t scam people in RuneScape because the game is too dumb for clever scams. If you want some good examples of scams/thievery and general douchyness done right, see old Ultima Online articles and stories. The amount of clever things people do is crazy.

Got any handy links?
[/quote]http://web.archive.org/web/20081121001545/http://www.spleens.net/minerfarm.html

The website is sadly gone, and web achives do not show screenshots, but enjoy the text![/quote]
that made me laugh a little, truly interesting.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

No, but you can buy/sell the result of the time.

item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:142, topic:448065”][quote author=…::Coded::… link=topic=550959.msg4045424#msg4045424 date=1342060163]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=550959.msg4045405#msg4045405 date=1342058401]

As for the people here that are just making sarcastic remarks to our metaphors and analogies.

That would be me…

It’s plain stupid “Your take pixels… HOLYSHIT STICKS YOU JSUT STOLE A CAR OR A DIAMOND BRACELET!!@@!!”

Gp has no irl value, so your not stealing a car or a diamond bracelet, your steal currency in a game, that only has value in a game nothing more.

And what you said about trying to make myself feel better by saying this, again I don’t and never will scam, I only feel that it doesn’t make you a bad person.

Pretty sure GP has IRL value.

Not supposed o have value if u follow the game rules which i do, so it’s worth nothing out side of the game to me

So those countless hours spent getting that gold has no worth to you? That if I were to simply ask can I have all of your money you would just give it away, as you don’t care. It has no worth or value to you?
[/quote]Couldn’t have put it better myself.

Guys, …::Coded::… is willing to give us all his gp! Better start pming him to give you some!

Outside of them game I said, If I were to llose all my gp I would say that I lost However much I lost, not I lost 500$ worth of goods.
[/quote]Either way, it still has value outside of the game, in terms of time.[/quote]
You can’t buy or sell time

This quote is getting too long, I don’t think that we can ever come ot a close agreement so lets jsut agree ot disagree

Read full topic
item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote="…::Coded::…, post:141, topic:448065"][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=550959.msg4045405#msg4045405 date=1342058401]

As for the people here that are just making sarcastic remarks to our metaphors and analogies.

That would be me…

It’s plain stupid “Your take pixels… HOLYSHIT STICKS YOU JSUT STOLE A CAR OR A DIAMOND BRACELET!!@@!!”

Gp has no irl value, so your not stealing a car or a diamond bracelet, your steal currency in a game, that only has value in a game nothing more.

And what you said about trying to make myself feel better by saying this, again I don’t and never will scam, I only feel that it doesn’t make you a bad person.

Pretty sure GP has IRL value.

Not supposed o have value if u follow the game rules which i do, so it’s worth nothing out side of the game to me

So those countless hours spent getting that gold has no worth to you? That if I were to simply ask can I have all of your money you would just give it away, as you don’t care. It has no worth or value to you?
[/quote]Couldn’t have put it better myself.

Guys, …::Coded::… is willing to give us all his gp! Better start pming him to give you some!

Outside of them game I said, If I were to llose all my gp I would say that I lost However much I lost, not I lost 500$ worth of goods.[/quote]Either way, it still has value outside of the game, in terms of time.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

Guys, …::Coded::… is willing to give us all his gp! Better start pming him to give you some![/quote]

[/quote]

That would be me…

It’s plain stupid “Your take pixels… HOLYSHIT STICKS YOU JSUT STOLE A CAR OR A DIAMOND BRACELET!!@@!!”

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @_Coded ..::Coded::..
item.description:
@_Coded wrote:

Taharok:

As for the people here that are just making sarcastic remarks to our metaphors and analogies.

That would be me…

It’s plain stupid “Your take pixels… HOLYSHIT STICKS YOU JSUT STOLE A CAR OR A DIAMOND BRACELET!!@@!!”

Gp has no irl value, so your not stealing a car or a diamond bracelet, your steal currency in a game, that only has value in a game nothing more.

And what you said about trying to make myself feel better by saying this, again I don’t and never will scam, I only feel that it doesn’t make you a bad person.

item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @ox_random_xi ox random xi
item.description:
@ox_random_xi wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:132, topic:448065”][quote author=ox random xi link=topic=550959.msg4045239#msg4045239 date=1342048620]

[quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=550959.msg4045189#msg4045189 date=1342045649]

Of course, I discourage hacking, that’s mean and offensive but scamming or tricking people into giving something… Smart.
[/quote]By your (retarded) logic, hacking would be smarter than scamming because you get more money.

It’s not about JUST the money, scamming is tricking another player not overly fucking him over
[/quote]Either way, your logic is stupid and makes no sense. How is scamming or tricking people ‘smarter’ than hacking? You can scam people in extremely retarded ways (like flower game or doubling money) or hack people in extremely smart ways… and whether or not someone gets ‘fucked over’ is not for you to decide, like Taharok said it’s all relative and even scamming 500k from one person may ‘fuck them over’.[/quote]
i just feel like hacking is forcefully taking their items while scamming they’re handing their items over to you by out-smarting them.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @m1lkman m1lkman
item.description:
@m1lkman wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:131, topic:448065”][quote author=m1lkman link=topic=550959.msg4045285#msg4045285 date=1342050858]
Social Engineering is a form of hacking.
[/quote]
if you can social engineer your way into the account, then congrats.[/quote]
Social engineering is used in scamming. Well, not with the “Doubling money” scam. Retards just spam the chat box.

I’m trying to say that social engineering and scamming are the same. Social engineering and hacking are the same (all social engineering is hacking but not all hacking is social engineering). A+B = B+C, therefore A = C. Scamming is hacking.

Read full topic
item.source: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?

item.title: Does Scamming in RS make you a bad person?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2

@davidi2 wrote:

Of course, I discourage hacking, that’s mean and offensive but scamming or tricking people into giving something… Smart.
[/quote]By your (retarded) logic, hacking would be smarter than scamming because you get more money.

It’s not about JUST the money, scamming is tricking another player not overly fucking him over[/quote]Either way, your logic is stupid and makes no sense. How is scamming or tricking people ‘smarter’ than hacking? You can scam people in extremely retarded ways (like flower game or doubling money) or hack people in extremely smart ways… and whether or not someone gets ‘fucked over’ is not for you to decide, like Taharok said it’s all relative and even scamming 500k from one person may ‘fuck them over’.

Read full topic
